title: Moto G71 5G (Arctic Blue, 128 GB)  (6 GB RAM)

product_specification.GPS Type: GPS, A-GPS, LTEPP, SUPL, GLONASS, GALILEO
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year on Handset and 6 Months on Accessories

product_description.Powerful Qualcomm Snapdragon 695 Process: The moto g71 5G features Qualcomm Snapdragon 695 5G Processor to deliver fast graphics card performance, thus transforming your gaming experience into a realistic one. Also, this mobile phone comes with 6 GB of RAM and an expanded 2 GB of RAM so that you can seamlessly multitask between apps.
product_description.True 5G with 13 Global 5G Bands: Enjoy connecting to blazing-fast 5G networks and download your favourite shows within a few seconds, and stream videos with a significant lag, as this moto g71 mobile phone comes with a fast 5G connection.
product_description.Smooth and Vibrant Display: Experience every content coming back to life on the 16.25 cm (6.4) AMOLED FHD display that comes with a 409 PPI pixel density and can reach up to 700 nits brightness to make visuals look true to life. As a result, you can enjoy crystal-clear visuals featuring dark blacks for enhanced brightness and contrasts.
product_description.ThinkShield Security for Mobile: Stay protected with ThinkShield security on this moto g71 5G mobile phone. This business-grade security helps to safeguard your data from malware, phishing and other threats through multiple layers of protection and advanced security.
product_description.50 MP Quad Function Camera: Flaunt your 50 MP Quad Function Camera System that lets you capture your special moments in vividly-clear shots under any light. And, with its 8 MP Ultrawide and 8 MP Depth Sensor and Macro Vision Camera, you can enjoy capturing low-light photos and detailed close-ups shots.
product_description.Blazing-fast 5000 mAh Battery: You don't have to be tired of your phone’s battery running out soon, thanks to the massive 5000 mAh Battery in the new moto g71 5G. Work, play games, stream movies, video chat with your friends, and do more for up to 30 hours on a single full charge. And, with 33 W TurboPower charging, your phone gets charged up in just 30 minutes so that you can go back to using your phone as soon as possible.
product_description.Stunning Design: This mobile phone comes with a curved body featuring rounded corners so that you can enjoy immersive usage on its expanded screen as well as enjoy good looks while you carry it outside.
product_description.Massive Storage Capacity: Thanks to the built-in 128 GB of storage capacity on this mobile phone, you can have ample space for storing your favourite photos, videos, and other necessities in one place.
product_description.Near-stock Android Experience: You don’t have to go through the hassle of duplicate apps and clunky ads, as this mobile comes with a Near-stock Android experience that allows you to manage your privacy settings, conversations, and more.
product_description.IP52 Water-repellent Design: Thanks to the water-repellent design, you don't have to worry about spills and splashes damaging your phone’s functioning. So, keep taking your calls even during rains or while you are swimming in the pool.

review:
I am using this phone for 2 days now. As per my opinion the battery life and the display ar quite good. Camera is also decent.
As I was a Redmi user before, so I would like to mention few points. This phone doesn't have any
🔴 Sound Recorder
🔴 Gallery
🔴For seeing the daily data usage and internet speed you have to download different application.
But the problem I am facing most is the call quality. The microphone's recieving power is not good at all.
Otherwise it's performance is great till now. I am very happy with all other things. If the above mentioned points are not necessary for you. And you need a smooth functioning, clean UI Phone. Then definitely you can go for it. It really feels good in hand and all the applications are running fine.
I hope the review is helpful 😄.

Hi All,

I got this phone from Flipkart on 1st Feb 2022 that is 9 days ago. So I will post my honest reviews on this. I have not tested or played games in it as I play games in my other phone one plus 7T.

But in other things, here are below Good things :-

1) Good crisp display with AMOLED Full HD display.
2) Battery backup is excellent. Screen on time ranging from 10 hrs to 11 hrs SOT (Note that I don't play games on this device).
3) Charging speed is ok (33W fast charger). Phone will charge from 0 to 100 % in about 75 mins time.
4) Though it doesn't have stereo speakers but still the sound quality while listening music or watching videos is excellent on this phone both via speakers and earphones and also via bluetooth earphones.
5) Software experience is quite clean with no ADS or Bloatwares. Moto UI is always clean with zero ads.
6) Call quality is also excellent both via speaker or earphones. Mic works good while on calls.
7) Processor is good. SD 695 chipset which is equivalent to Dimensity 900 or equal to SD 765.

Now some things which I think is not good :-

1) Though the display is AMOLED Full HD but screen refresh rate is only 60Hz. It should have been atleast 90Hz.
2) Camera could have been better though I have not tested camera much.
3) No stereo speakers in 19K phone.
4) Though software is clean with no ADS but Motorola has not confirmed how many major Android update and security updates it will get. (Though Android 12 is guaranteed).

NOTE :- Here were my honest reviews above. If you have any questions you can reach out to me.

Thanks,
Ritesh

The phone is light, comfortable to hold and quite thin. What stands out is the display. The colors are accurate which makes for a nice viewing experience. So far the processor seems snappy and I haven't experienced any lag. The audio and the front facing camera is decent but the main camera is nothing to boast about. The pictures taken are out of focus and seem to lack color. The fingerprint reader is also unresponsive at times, but it doesn't take away from the overall experience of the phone.

If you have a previous generation Moto g phone, you aren't missing much and I wouldn't suggest upgrading to this.

Get the g71 if you have a much older phone (<2017) and want a stock android experience. But there are cheaper options out there that offer similar features at a lower price.

Note: The phone does not come with earphones.

Motorola is my favourite brand . I'm using this version of moto from last 7 days . Performance, battery n sound quality is Awesome 👍. Amoled display with 13 5g band support is a great combination. Camera quality should have been better but no issue with that🙂. Overall performance of the phone is good. Love u moto 💕.

Excellent value for money phone
Writing this after using it for a week
Pros-
Great display, excellent battery life(lasts easily for 1.5 days), top notch performance(no issues so far)
Compact design which is easy to hold and use in one hand.
Stock ui experience, clean interface.
Cons-
The only negative about this phone is its camera quality.
My 4 year old honor phone give better results with 12mp camera, compared to this phone.
Colours are great but it lacks clarity, even after taking a full 50MP shots. Also the 2 MP macro camera is useless, it shouldn't be there.

If you are looking for a phone with great camera, then you would be disappointed, other than that its a great phone

Awesome phone!! Motorola is a trusted brand. My previous Moto g5 plus I have used for 4.5 yrs 😍 super impressed with g71 and its intelligent features. Superb display, works buttery smooth... Performance is simply ace! I don't know why people complain about the camera, I found it excellent. Well, I am not very selfie obsessed and do not post pics on social media but do use the camera sometimes and found it awesome! Thank you Flipkart and thank you Moto 😘😘

From 10 days of usage, I can confidently say performance of the phone on this price bracket is amazing, snapdragon 695 is looking a good prospect in power, efficiency and RAM management. Though I am not a gamer to explore its limits. 1.5 days of damn sure battery life for the general user though if you have 1 hr of video conference. It is a polycarbonate built but still it was really put together well. Selling points of this phone would be excellent Amoled screen stock android, no advertisement, Lenovo Thinksheild protection and Motorola has promised to give 2 yr updates and hope they stand by what they say. Only gripe would be Motorola could have gone with some sort of Gorilla protection for the display.

Overall if you are looking for a steady performer with great efficiency, security, Amoled screen, stock Android and your budget is around 20k, this is the phone for you!

Totally genuine review after 2weeks of use.

The phone seems comfortable to use in below aspects as given in its description:
1. Camera is actually good, it process the image post click for better images.
2. The images when taken efficiently comes out well but on walking or movement they get blurred.
3. No blot ware as it's near stock Android.
4. 5G can't be tested soon but seems comfortable connecting the wifi 5g band that's normally provided these days.
5. The features and customisation available for phone is quite good.
6. Performance is good so far.
7. Display and colour contrast looks good and classy neither too bright to eyes nor too dull. Balanced well to give a decent clean look.
8. Dolby Atmos is the only speaker feature but could improve with 2 speakers.

Lacking below things :

1. No magnetic compass app.
2. Call recording always occured with announcement, can't disable announcement.
3.Earphones and screen guard were mentioned in box details here, but it's not available in the box.
4.Charging speed was mentioned as 33w but the battery drains faster and charges slowly. Not upto mark.
5. No installed notepad app, music, recording and album app. It uses default Google photos app.

Worth buying as the processor and display, cam pixels, performance, cost, connecting bands and sound quality with near stock Android. Most of the concerns can be fixed installing apps manually if needed except charging... But, on moderate rate of use charging stays for entire day. So can compromise on that then you can go for it.

I have been using the Moto G71 5G for more than a month now(from 28th Jan).
The Display is superb 😍, Good Battery life too.. charging is also fast.
The camera 📸 was not I expected. It's a descent camera no dout about it. It gives social media ready pics, little colour boost, skin smoothening...etc. the people who use extra filters and apps for that will definitely love this, I don't like that type of photos, I like the natural photography, natural colours and my face as it is. Now I am using a google camera port and I am getting great photos from it... But my wife will still prefer the Moto camera 😉.
Everything is super smooth, no complaints at all.
The stock Android experience is awesome, but still running on Android 11 (13/03/2022)
The design, I don't liked it at first but now it is growing on me.
Fingerprint sensor is on the back, no problem there easily reachable. And that can be use to pull down notification tray. But no other gesture like screen off, which was seen in earlier Moro phones. Manufacturers should give more usability when they go with back sensors.
Motorola should added a Compass sensor to it, didn't faced any issues in Google Map.

An excellent phone in all aspects.
Charging amazingly fast.the battery held the charge for full two days with charge still to go until the next morning. With two sims on and data on and usage.i was using a xiomi 10 which lasts not so long.
Smooth to use
Quality and build excellent.
Some gesture features are nice and handy.for ex shake for light on etc etc.
Sound clarity dolby atmos is very good and loud and rich.
Gps is quick to lock and seemed very accurate,10t redmi took a longer time and was many times inaccurate.
i think it has all the good things and is a no nonsense phone.
Cons: it does not have a magnetometer which means it will not display compass readings.no effect on GPS though.
Motorola is a trusted brand and the phone,at the price that it is being offered,is a worthy buy.

Motorola G71 5G is a amazing phone at this price point 🥰🌟
Display- Quality is amazing but if company give 90hz Or 120hz so it's almost fabulous but it's ok at price point.
Battery- Battery performance is also amazing almost it give me 1 day battery backup and 33 watt charger is very fast for charging it's take 55 to 60 minutes for full charge.
Camera- camera of this phone is not good at this price point camera is ok camera need a software update to fix the exposure issue in camera not good😡.
Performance- Performance of this phone is amazing with 695G processor it's very fast for day to day usage performance is very good I like it.
Connectivity- i use a jio sim i did not get proper tower in the phone some time give 2 or 3 idle in the tower I am very disappointed with that because previous I use redmi note 6 pro it gives always full network but in this I facing this issue.
Conclusion- It's very good phone for daily usage but think about this point of my usage.

I will rate 4.5star overall.

Excellent phone with great performance, feels feather light on hand. Great display can't tell about the screen refresh rate I think it's 60Hz with sharp images, sound from speaker is decent enough not so loud but good and clear sound. Camera is the only thing I found to complaint about videos taken by camera is good but front camera need to be improved I would give 3.5/5 for it camera performance only hope they improve it in future software updates. Call quality is superb, with no heating issue. Phone is capable of handling all kind of gaming activities(only played Asphalt 9,COD). Charging is fast overall a extremely good value for money. Deserve a 5★ rating.

Best battery, above avg camera, processor is good, little confused with processor numbering though.

The phone comes with stock android so hardly any adds, bugs or spam applications. Being a moto user for four years, little new to stock android so sometimes I miss fancy interfaces of poco.

Didn't understand moto choice of not providing compass sensor in 18k phone, that's the only major drawback I must say. You definitely will face problem with navigation sometimes as the map has to run on only GPS signal. Not recommended phone if you are a daily navigation user.

Last point, personally liked green color better than blue and it would have been better if it comes in black or gray with matt finish.
Moto G71 is a balanced phone. Superb Amoled display, good battery life, improvement required in camera...

This review is after a full day use. A very good phone in this price range with a powerful processor and a good battery life. This device gave me a battery life of 25.5 hrs from 100% to 21%. A decent camera and its biggest usp software is brilliant. After using MIUI for 3 years the moto MyUx feels light and fast to use and not adds nothing. The UI is customisable and hence give a personalized experience. Just waiting for Android 12 update in the phone.
Only thing I miss is expandable memory, though 128gb is enough but still expandable would have mad it a wonderful phone, also 60 hz display. For me 60Hz is fine but at this price we see phones with 90Hz. Overall this an amazing phone that I can suggest to anyone.

Processor does the job well without any lag.

Review after 1 week usage
Pros:
Great display
Snapdragon 695 is a very capable processor for day to day task...
Awesome battery backup..would easily last a day with moderate usage
It's not having stereo speakers but the single speakers are loud and clear. It's also having Dolby Atmos support.
Clean Stock Android experience.
13 bands of 5G (No Gimmick)
Cons:
Camera is average. It boosts the colors and the blurring effect is not calibrated properly. In good lighting conditions the photos come out really good.
No higher refresh rate ( this might bother some people who have used a higher refresh rate device before,otherwise you won't notice it. There are no lags or jitters in day to day operations!)
No SD Card slot
There is no inbuilt gallery or app lock feature (this might bother some people migrating to stock Android from other UI )
But definitely this provides a good value for money and is definitely one of the best phones in this price segment. If you are looking for a camera centric phone then you can go for Redmi Note 10 series. Otherwise this is a great phone to have in this price segment.

After 45 days of use I am totally disappointed by this phones performance. Too many glitches and issues:
1. The automatic brightness sensor is perpetually confused, screen brightness keeps flickering and it even happens during video calls
2. Battery performance is okay but drains really fast when using Bluetooth devices
3. App crashes are common
4. Normal pictures taken during day are okayish but low light shots come out very crappy
5. Camera processing is slow and there is lag when recording videos. This is very irritating as taking a still framed video also looks glitchy
6. Gaming performance is okay but there are performance lags there also
7. Only good thing about the phone is looks and weight, even the stock android doesn't save it from so many performance issues
Biggest con of the phone is call quality which is below average. Similarly camera is pretty average on this price point. Otherwise, all other features are as expected of Moto

Finger print sensor and face detection quality is very good compared to other company phones except Apple. Having 5000mah battery it is still light weight. No unnecessary boult wares or ads. Having said these pros, the concern area is the camera. The back primery camera is fine, the macro camera has various issues and the front camera quality is not as good as expected.

Overall if one is looking for a phone with quality performance, display, battery life and ease of use in a moderate budget and not because of camera quality then without any doubt go for it.

pros.Performance: The Qualcomm Snapdragon 695 5G Processor is superfast and gives optimal gaming performance.
pros.16.25 cm (6.4) AMOLED FHD display: The AMOLED FHD display gives crystal clear visuals and a smooth, vibrant experience.
pros.5000 mAh Battery: This phone comes with a 5000 mAh battery and a 33W turbopower charger giving 10+ hours of backup on heavy usage.

cons.Camera: The triple camera setup and 16MP front camera combination is not upto the mark and is of average quality.

summary.verdict: The Moto G71 5G is an amazing phone at this price point suitable for daily use and an awesome gaming experience.
